text: Alsuviricetes is a class of RNA viruses which infect eukaryotes. Member viruses have a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome. The name of the group is a portmanteau of "alpha supergroup" and -viricetes which is the suffix for a virus class. ==Taxonomy== The following orders are recognized: *Hepelivirales *Martellivirales *Tymovirales ==References== Category:Tymovirales Category:Viruses
title: Alsuviricetes
